result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Brooks

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael J Brooks in court with attorney Donald L. Conner.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski.
Plea:  14CF68 - Ct. 2 - G.
BTC:
14CF68:  Ct. 1 - DRI.  Ct. 2 - GUILTY.
14CF697:  DRI.
PSI ordered.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Department Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 3:00 p.m.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Brooks
Current: 2037 N. Wisconsin Street, Racine, WI 53402   (Effective: 07-15-2014)
Prior: 1724 Blaine Av, Racine, WI 53405

Defendant Michael J Brooks in court with attorney Donald L. Conner.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Arraignment scheduled for August 29, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Initial appearance on June 27, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Donald L Conner in court.  Jennifer C Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. Atty mailed notice to wrong address. Atty requesting this be adj.  to track with 14CF68  Initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 09:00 am.
